column4: Hi, i recentely installed ubuntu 9.1, i'm having a huge problem with pppoe, in ubuntu previous versions it worked perfectly, in this new version of ubuntu, i have to choose between wired connection, OR dsl connection, but i use a dsl connection THROUGH a wired connection, so in other OS and older versions of ubuntu, i used a wired connection + a dsl connection that was dialed (pppoe)
ps; i have a modem connected to a wireless router, the wireless router is set to do the DHCP and the modem is in bridge mode.
the network connections didn't connect, they were unselectable
i set the router to DHCP
the modem is in bridge mode
the network connection? or this (sudo dhclient)
the ip ident from router to pc
i was accessing the other pcs in the network and using terminal server client, should i test the (sudo dhclient) ?
so the problem is your modem and router
